text: DYDW (531 AM) Radyo Diwa is a radio station owned and operated by Word Broadcasting Corporation. Its studio and transmitter are located at 2F Modesta Bldg., Bonifacio St., Tacloban.Yolanda Cuts Down JournalistsChurch-run radio station aids Philippines typhoon victims62nd Leyte Landing committee searches for liberation babiesMedia man dies in a car accident ==References== Category:Radio stations in Tacloban Category:Christian radio stations in the Philippines Category:Radio stations established in 1989
title: DYDW-AM
